channel.title: Automate on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Automate on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Okta Terraform Provider
item.description: Okta Terraform Provider Click here to give feedback about this page Group Notes Group description: - Changes: update title Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Automate org management with Terraform: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/terraform-landing-page/main/ Why is this here?: Based on Oktane GroupIt data, most external customers placed Terraform under Automate Content type: Guide Hub A guide hub is the main navigation page for a section, such as learn, plan, or build.

item.title: Implement a hook
item.description: Implement a hook Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Content type: Dynamic Index A dynamic index is an automatically generated list of links to topics immediately beneath it based purely on the site’s structure, or with some level of filtering. A blind list of summaries and links to child docs. For example: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/authorization/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/api-security/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/manage-users/

item.title: Manage your org with the Powershell CLI
item.description: Manage your org with the Powershell CLI Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Notes from conversation with Bhavik, Maurice and Dan: Doing a youtube about potential use cases. They have identified 525 custs using unofficial powershell cli. They are the target market. Target them in pendo in admin console - target them and notify them, Tell them Okta as a new powershell cli, Link to youtube podcast.
